EmailTemplate.name: 11-30-21 62/64 Global Campaign Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: WATCH – Cash recycling, made simple
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Cash use has bounced back and consumers have embraced self-service channels to fulfil basic cash transactions. So how can you continue to leverage value from your self-service channel while reducing operating costs? Easily. With cash recycling ATMs, you can optimize your cash ecosystem by making the cash deposited by customers available for the next withdrawal – recycling it straight back into circulation. This significantly reduces how often you need to replenish your ATMs. See how it works in our latest video. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
